options.formula:
IF(
    AND(
        {fldDWvKStWsLmWrAh}, 
        {fld8JlsvKGnnJxX5V}, 
        NOT(OR({fld8JlsvKGnnJxX5V} = "Per Project", {fld8JlsvKGnnJxX5V} = "Ad Hoc")), 
        IS_AFTER(TODAY(), {fldyDWN98OVtqHwVa}), 
        IS_BEFORE(TODAY(), {fldDWvKStWsLmWrAh}), 
        OR(NOT({fldvvznCJrpCdWFw4}), {fldvvznCJrpCdWFw4} = 0) 
    ),
    "🔴 Needs Scheduling", 
    "✅ OK" 
)

fields.name: _AllShootMemberEmailsRollup
fields.description: A formula field that rolls up the email addresses of the primary creator and other team members associated with the shoot

fields.name: Deliverable Title
fields.description: Generates a title for the deliverable by combining the client name and the deliverable type, or using a default 'Untitled Deliverable' if either is missing.
